thing-type.label: Flood sensor Flood/water sensor
thing-type.description: Flood/water sensor<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gtFlood/Water detection</p&gt <br /&gt<h2&gtInclusion Information</h2&gt<ol&gt<li&gtRemove the sensor cover.</li&gt <li&gtMake sure the sensor is powered.</li&gt <li&gtSet Z‐Wave controller or Z‐Wave gateway into inclusion mode (Refer to the controller or gateway operating manual)</li&gt <li&gtPress the button three times within 1.5 second, the device will enter inclusion mode. And the LED will flash on and off alternately five times..</li&gt </ol&gt<br /&gt<h2&gtExclusion Information</h2&gt<ol&gt<li&gtRemove the device cover.</li&gt <li&gtMake sure the sensor is powered.</li&gt <li&gtSet Z‐Wave controller or Z‐Wave gateway into exclusion mode (Refer to the controller or gateway operating manual)</li&gt <li&gtPress the button three times within 1.5 second, the device will enter exclusion mode.</li&gt </ol&gt<br /&gt<h2&gtWakeup Information</h2&gt<ul&gt<li&gtYou can press the button once to wake up the device and send wakeup notification to controller.</li&gt <li&gtIf press successfully, the LED will blink one time.</li&gt <li&gtThe minimum wakeup interval is 300s</li&gt <li&gtThe maximum wakeup interval is 16,777,200s (about 194 days)</li&gt <li&gtAllowable interval among each wakeup interval is 60 second, such as 360, 420, 480…</li&gt <li&gtNote: The default value is 12 hours. This value is longer, the battery life is greater.</li&gt </ul&gt

parameter.name: config_1_1
parameter.label: 1: Alarm Duration Time
parameter.description: Alarm Duration Time<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtThis configuration parameter that can be used to adjust the time for beep and LED turned on when water leakage is detected.</p&gt <p&gtIf this parameter is set to ‘0’, the beep and LED will be turn on always until water leakage is not detected</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_2_2
parameter.label: 2: Alarm Interval
parameter.description: Alarm Interval<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtThis Parameter defines beep on /off interval time when water leakage is detected.</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_3_1
parameter.label: 3: First Alarm On Time Duration
parameter.description: First Alarm On Time Duration<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtThis parameter defines beep on duration first time when water leakage is detected.</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_4_1
parameter.label: 4: Alarm on Time Duration
parameter.description: Alarm on Time Duration<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtThis parameter defines beep on duration after first beep on when water leakage is detected.</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_5_1
parameter.label: 5: Alarm Enable/Disable
parameter.description: Alarm Enable/Disable<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtThis parameter defines beep on is enabled or disabled when water leakage is detected.</p&gt <ul&gt<li&gt‘0’ indicate beep on is disable, but LED will be turned on when water leakage detected.</li&gt <li&gt‘1’ indicate beep on is enabled, the BEEP and LED will be turned on when water leakage detected.</li&gt </ul&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_6_1
parameter.label: 6: Water Leakage Detection
parameter.description: Water Leakage Detection<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtThis parameter defines the function than water leakage detect is enabled or disabled.</p&gt <ul&gt<li&gt‘0’ indicate disable water leakage detect,</li&gt <li&gt‘1’ indicate enable water leakage detect.</li&gt </ul&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_7_1
parameter.label: 7: Basic Set Level
parameter.description: Basic Set Level<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtBasic Set Command will be sent where contains a value when the door/window is opened or closed, the receiver will take it for consideration; for instance, if a lamp module is received the Basic Set Command of which value is decisive as to how bright of dim level of lamp module shall be.</p&gt</p&gt
